questions.question: What is the Prototype Design Pattern?
options: A design pattern used in software development
A pattern used to create new game characters
A pattern used to clone database records
A pattern used in graphical user interfaces

questions.question: How is the Prototype Design Pattern used in software development?
In which context can the Prototype Design Pattern be used?
What is one benefit of using the Prototype Design Pattern in game development?
options: Creating new instances based on prototypes

questions.question: When working with databases, what can the Prototype Design Pattern be used for?
What is the main purpose of the Prototype Design Pattern?
What should be considered when deciding whether to use the Prototype Design Pattern?
options: The architectural context of the application
The specific requirements and relationships between objects
The need for a Prototype Registry
The properties and behaviors of prototype objects

questions.question: When is the Prototype Registry useful?
options: When dealing with a large number of prototype objects

questions.question: What should be done to ensure the clarity and completeness of prototype objects?
options: Register prototype objects with the registry

questions.question: What are the benefits of using the Prototype Design Pattern?
options: Creating new instances based on prototypes
